subject: Speak Jet 6 on ebay for Fund Raiser
author: dead.science
full_text:
Hi All:

I am really trying to get 10 more boxes out in the field.  I have
listed box 6 on ebay.  I will use ALL the money from the sale to buy
Speakjet Chips.  They cost $30.00 each!  I have all the parts for 10
more boxes and just need the chips.  I was going to put one a month
out but I really want to get them out faster than that.  So if all
goes well I will send out many boxes in the next couple weeks.  The
listing is under Speakjet Box EVP Ghost box Paranormal.

Thanks Rob.
